revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: [col. I] Bank; Hathyr, 42 dr.; Choiach, 11 dr. 4 ob.; Tybe, 8 dr.; [l. 5] Mechir, 3 dr. 3 ob.; Phamenoth, 18 dr. 3 ob.; Pharmouthi, 32 dr. 4 ob.; Pachon, 33 dr. 5 ob.; Paunei, 68 dr. 5 ob.; [l. 10] Epeiph, 82 dr. 4 ob.; Mesore, 54 dr. 5 ob.; in the month Sebastos; of the 4th year; for the 3rd year, 29 dr.; Phaophi, 14 dr.; Total 399 dr. 5 ob.; [l. 15] remains 361 dr.; from which funds 93 dr., remaining 267 dr. 5 ob. [col. II] the amount of the dike-tax for the 2nd year, 1803 dr. 1 ob.; Bank; Phaophi, 6 dr. 4 ob.; [l. 20] Hathyr, 6 dr. 4 ob.; Choiach, 27 dr. 4 ob.; Tybe, 20 dr.; Mechir, 33 dr. 2 ob.; Phamenoth, 102 dr. 1 ob.; [l. 25] Pharmouthi, 180 dr.; Germanikios, 20 dr.; Paunei, 83 dr. 2 ob.; Epeiph, 213 dr. 2 ob.; Mesore, 6 dr. 4 ob.; [l. 30] [hand 2] Total 700 dr. [hand 1] remaining 1103 dr. 1 ob.
